channel.description:
[center][url=http://astralflight.net][img]http://i.imgur.com/Dj3t7oS.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
Client download - www.Astralflight.net/client.jar Just join the server and give it a chance it's actually really fun and unique! Today is also the servers first day online! If you join early look forward to earning veteran rank!

item.title: AstralFlight [LAG FREE | PERFECT SKILLS | BOSSES | PKING ]

item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:10, topic:539571”]Tried it out last night, awesome!

It’s all done well, and layed out.
Especially the whole points systems are well done. :)[/quote]
Thanks man!
And the youtube likes i did not do myself. A friend of mine said he would get it likes and I just agreed. I am very surprised about the outcome though!

item.title: AstralFlight [LAG FREE | PERFECT SKILLS | BOSSES | PKING ]
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

Stealmojo:

I love the old looks, the server looks good, I may give it a try…

Thanks!
updates
vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
Added thieving points which are acquired by safe cracking successfully.


Fixed where players weren’t receiving starters
Fixed client freezing
Chaos Elemental now drops ALL pvp armor (vesta, statius, zuriels)
Increased smithing xp
Big bones now give less xp
Mystery boxes have better rewards
Tweaked some drop rates
Removed ring of wealth from smithing
ring of wealth added to slayer store
changed barrows system also made barrows a tad easier
skilling area added/moved some objects around

Read full topic
